org.apache.polygene.library.http

Interface JettyService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    HttpService, JettyActivation
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    SecureJettyService

    @Mixins(value=JettyMixin.class)
 @Activators(value=JettyActivation.Activator.class)
public interface JettyService
extends HttpService, JettyActivation
